name: The One
description: The One, originally bred by Clackamas Coots or CC, is a perfectly balanced hybrid of two landrace strains. It is sometimes referred to by its genetic combination Thai x Pure Afghan, with its sativa heritage stemming from its Thai background and the Afghan influence bringing a thick resinous frosting of trichomes. This specific combination of two cornerstone landrace strains is known to only be available through a select circle of breeders and growers in Oregon.
attributes_title: Giggly, Happy, Relaxed, Creative, Talkative, Stress, Pain, Depression, Insomnia, Nausea, Anxious, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes
